
### fork  {.smaller}


* <code>pid_t fork()</code> --- copy the current process
* returns twice: 

   * in <i>parent</i> (original process): pid of new <i>child</i> process
   * in <i>child</i> (new process): <code>0</code>

* <em>everything (but pid) duplicated</em> in parent, child: 

   * memory
   * file descriptors (later)
   * registers
